## Submission Checklist

Please confirm that your submission meets all requirements:

### Repository Requirements
- [ ] Repository is **public** and accessible
- [ ] README.md includes comprehensive project documentation
- [ ] README.md includes installation/setup instructions
- [ ] README.md includes usage examples
- [ ] License file is included (MIT recommended)
- [ ] Code includes comments and documentation
- [ ] Repository shows actual development (minimum 5+ commits)

### Table Entry Requirements
- [ ] Followed exact table format from CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] All team member names are listed correctly
- [ ] Academic year is specified (YYYY-YYYY format)
- [ ] Technologies are listed accurately
- [ ] Demo/Video link is working (or N/A if not available)
- [ ] GitHub repository badge link is correct

### Pull Request Quality
- [ ] PR title follows format: `Add [Project Name] - [Team Name]`
- [ ] No merge conflicts with main branch
- [ ] Added project at the end of the table
- [ ] Maintained consistent formatting with existing entries
- [ ] Tested all links before submission

### Documentation Quality
- [ ] Project README is clear and well-written
- [ ] Setup instructions are complete and tested
- [ ] Code follows professional standards
- [ ] No sensitive information (passwords, API keys) in repository
